name: Orion's Belt Expedition
description:
In this adventure you are responsible for managing a Generation Ship with the mission to explore Orion's Belt. Take care of the ship and its crew and don't run out of resources but also don't let anything go beyond maximum capacity! Visit the planets in search of materials to help you in your amazing space exploration!

Consider supporting the developer to create more projects! Donate with Paypal

Ou pelo PicPay: https://picpay.me/lucas.anjos.santos3

Other projects: https://lucasanjos.itch.io/
